title.firstTime: Take the test and get a present
title.common1: Take the test and find out which level of the
title.common2: English language course suits you best

description.firstTime1: Find out which level of the
description.firstTime2: English language course suits you best.There is only one correct answer for each question. You have to give at least one answer to complete the test
description.common: There is only one correct answer for each question. You have to give at least one answer to complete the test

tasks.dragAndDropWord: Look at the pictures and match the words with them.
tasks.chooseOne: Look at the sentences and choose the best answer.
tasks.inputSentence: Put the words in the correct order to make sentences.
tasks.trueOrFalse: Look at the picture, read the sentence and choose true or false.
tasks.readText: Read the text and choose the best answer.
tasks.listenAndChoose: Listen to the recording and choose the best answer.
